data.app_name: Bike Attack Race - Bike Racing Game
data.description:
Bike Attack Race is an offline stunt bike racing game where you can become the ultimate street bike warrior. Race against rival bikers on dangerous tracks, perform death-defying stunts, and shoot down anyone who gets in your way. Choose from a variety of bikes and tracks to challenge yourself.

In Bike Attack Race , you will:
- Shoot your opponents with a variety of weapons, including pistols, shotguns, machine guns, and even rocket launchers, to slow them down or eliminate them from the race.
- Choose from a variety of bikes, each with its own unique stats and abilities. Some bikes are better for speed, while others are better for handling.
- Race on different tracks with different challenges, such as narrow paths, obstacles, traps, and even other vehicles.
- Collect power-ups to help you win the race, such as speed boosts, health boosts, weapon upgrades.
- Unlock new bikes and tracks as you progress through the game.
Compete against other AI players from around the world.
- Bike Attack Race is a fun and challenging game that is sure to appeal to fans of bike attack racing games. The game is free to download and play, but there are in-app purchases available.

Here are some of the features that make Bike Attack Race unique:
- Stunning graphics
- Realistic physics
- Varied gameplay
- Customization options

If you are looking for a fun and challenging stunt bike racing game with a lot of features, then Bike Attack Race is the game for you. Download it today and start racing!
